attributes.action: It's time we honoured our last surviving bomber command crew with Knighthoods.
attributes.additional_details: These men and women failed to get the respect and honour they deserved from their country after the war and have been shunned by the very government and establishment for whom they carried out their orders at enormous personal loss.
attributes.background: I'd like the remaining bomber command crew to get knighthoods for their service to their country.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
